title: Total Order Quantity
description: Create a measure that calculates the total quantity of items ordered.

prompt.system: You are a DAX expert. Generate only the DAX code without any explanation or markdown formatting. Return the measure definition starting with the name followed by an equals sign.
prompt.user: Create a DAX measure called 'Total Quantity' that sums the 'Quantity' column from the 'Sales' table.
prompt.dataModelContext: You are working with a sales database. The Sales table contains: Order Number, Line Number, Order Date, Delivery Date, CustomerKey, StoreKey, ProductKey, Quantity (integer), Unit Price, Net Price, Unit Cost.
